name: Drumpf: Presidential Dating Simulator
description:
Young Dreamer and White House intern, Larry Lopez, is in for the fight of his life after making a high stakes bet with the President: either convince Drumpf to fall in love with him over the course of the next three days, or face deportation back to a home country he never knew.Featuring
  • Jaw dropping dialogue choices!
  • Branching Paths!
  • Lavishly illustrated art!
  • Passionate romance!
  • Beautiful music!
  • Exotic locales including Paris, Washington, Moscow, and more!

Will Larry succeed in his quest for love, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness, or find himself drowning in despair? It’s up to YOU to decide!
